response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,150,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1150000}
